website_summaries.verdict: Highly rated for its style, durability, and versatility, this 3-piece set won't disappoint.
pros: All 3 bags come with 4 swivel wheels for hassle-free portability
Sides of bags are padded for extra protection
Corners are reinforced for greater durability
cons: A few customers complain that the bags' zippers are low quality

customer_reviews.title: Good set!
customer_reviews.text: The suitcases seem to be made well, and I'd expect nothing less from American Tourister, being that they're owned by Samsonite. I ordered the purple, and the image on Amazon makes them appear like more of a lavender rather than the medium-purple color they are. I have pictures of them both inside with yellow light and outside with natural light so you can see the color. Personally I'm glad they're darker like this because the dirt won't show up as much as it would on the lavender. The size range is also really nice; options, options, options! Overall, I'm very pleased and would recommend this set to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: LizzieLizard

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one use.  Told Amazon or seller can't help.  Have to send to factory!
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke the first time I used the large suitcase. When I requested service from the seller I was told to send it back to the factory! AFER ONE USE?! REALLY?!
customer_reviews.author: Jim S

customer_reviews.title: ... 3 trips with us so far and are doing great. The spinning wheels make it so much easier ...
customer_reviews.text: These suitcases have been on 3 trips with us so far and are doing great. The spinning wheels make it so much easier to move around the airport. Very roomy and can fit a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: ... 5 stars is because the orange coloring despite being easy to spot and grab at the airport got pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this got 4 instead of 5 stars is because the orange coloring despite being easy to spot and grab at the airport got pretty dirty after the first flight. I love that they come with four wheels, it means we don't have to tip them to push them around. The sizes are just right, the smallest one can be used as carry on and the medium sized one has been perfect for a week trip packed for two people. The large one even with thoroughly packed still weighed less than 50lbs which is the airport weight limit.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Shipman

customer_reviews.title: We have 2 sets - they're perfect
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price for great suitcases. We've had them for 5 years now (1 international trip a year) and they're still going strong! We have the red set and the light blue set. I will say that both pretty gross looking because of the dirt and being dragged and tossed. It's more noticeable on the blue. But we don't mind. The good thing about the blue is that it's such a unique color that it's easy to spot.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat the price and the sizes!
customer_reviews.text: These came in the mail yesterday. The box was a bit damage, but the products are not damaged. The color is gorgeous and they roll so smoothly. I can't wait until we use them for vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Waste of our hard earned money, feel ripped off
customer_reviews.text: My first set of new luggage. It’s horrible! The wheels stick don’t turn as advertised, zipper pulls already broke off. I bought early for a September trip, NOW too late to return it! I’d never returned something used but in this case we had know way of knowing what a terrible product we bought!!!
customer_reviews.author: KNS

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Luggage
customer_reviews.text: I should have known. The wheels and handle do not work very well. I have used the largest suitcase and the smallest. It is difficult to roll particularly over any type of uneven surface and carpet. You have to kind of push. The handle is very wiggly and seems like it is going to snap off at any time. I have them ready to donate. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna D. McQuoid

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed a bit.
customer_reviews.text: Disapponted. They are kind of flimsy. The handles wabble alot, they feel like they may break when bag is full and rolling through the airport but especially if not on a perfectly smooth surface. I cant even put ky small laptop bag on top of it to roll through. The large size is so big i dont think I will ever use it. They do show dirt/get dingy fairly easily but i kind of expected given the lighter color and baggage handling. Ive only used mayve 5 trips, just don't feel sturdy as my old cheaper set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Also - the blue does not look nice and rich like the color in the picture
customer_reviews.text: These are not worth the money. They are very flimsy. I would not expect them to last very long. Also - the blue does not look nice and rich like the color in the picture. It looks faded. Would not recommend. I returned this set almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Leverich

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money (largest bag is too big for most airlines)
customer_reviews.text: For the money these suitcases seem to work quite well. Given the inexpensive price these will do just fine! Ignore all the negative reviews, these people complaining about the low quality and expecting perfection are not giving this package the benefit of the doubt. When you purchase one of the cheapest 3 piece sets available you have to adjust your expectations. This is a nice inexpensive set for someone who only travels occasionally, that who this is intended for. Con: The largest bag is 64.5 lin. inches. (32 x 20.5 x 12) 2.5 inches over max bag size for United Airlines (and many other airlines). That measurement is an empty bag (not overstuffed) and includes the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Remarc1

customer_reviews.title: Been around the world many times
customer_reviews.text: We tend to do a lot of traveling. We actually have 3 sets. My daughter's set has been with her to over 25 countries. My wife's has been to at least a dozen (multiple times). Mine has been through the rough and tumble of US carriers with frequent travel (10 or more trips a year). I bought the 3rd set a while back because I expected my first to start failing but it is still holding up great. All wheels role great still. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Scattarelli Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I needed luggage quickly. I was moving and would be flying back and forth taking things I had forgotten or couldn't fit in our cars. So far I have taken the carry-on sized bag three times and the larger bags once each. The larger bags held up in baggage and I had packed them full or clothes, random boxes, and other weird shaped items. Everything came out just fine. The purple is easily identifiable and wasn't been discolored yet. I will update on use as I go. Pros: Color Wheels can go any direction They all fit suggly inside each other Cons: Handle seems unsturdy I'm never sure which zipper does what - too many.
customer_reviews.author: Elou

customer_reviews.title: The luggage looks nice, just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: The luggage looks nice, just like the picture. However, it is very poor quality. The material is thin, and there wasn't very much support for the top or the sides.Definitely something that looked like it would rip apart after a few uses. We returned it immediately after receiving it. On the bright side, the seller was very prompt to issue our return and we had no hassles with that whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: GravityGear

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy luggage set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set in 2012, and just threw out the biggest one last week because TSA finally cracked it to the point where there was a gaping hole at the top. *insert eyeroll* This means I've had all three pieces over 7 years now, and the smaller two still work perfectly fine and are in decent shape. They're banged up and dirty, but that's just the way it goes with luggage anymore. If I could buy the big one by itself I'd just replace that one; shame I have to commit to a whole new set or nothing at all. Otherwise I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: EMK

customer_reviews.title: Good luggage..... for the price
customer_reviews.text: Needed to update our 15 year old luggage and this fit the bill. Only used for 1 trip so far. PROs Spinner wheels much better for navigating around the airport Material and zippers are of good construction Excellent price and solid brand name CONs The blue color is a bit light, almost teal. Would be more unisex in a navy blue After 1 flight became very dirty and didn't clean off much at all (see above)
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Techie

customer_reviews.title: Good (not amazing) luggage.  Great value.  Easy to overload the bigger sizes.  Rolls well, zips well.
customer_reviews.text: Very good luggage. There is a level of quality above this one for a bit more money, decide for yourself it you want to spend more money. I have the nicer quality of the same brand in the smallest size, and it feels slightly sturdier (particularly the handle) and rolls a little more smoothly. The rivets also look slightly more secure and the fabric feels slightly nicer. But, for the money, these three bags are good quality and a great value. It is easy to overload the larger two sizes above 50 pounds, be careful or you might pay huge "heavy bag" fees on airlines.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wick

customer_reviews.title: This road warrior says this set is a great value
customer_reviews.text: I travel frequently for work and regularly overload these suitcases - they are performing just fine. The purple I ordered is a bit more muted color than the online color choice would suggest, but it is unique and I have an easy time finding my luggage. One reviewer said hat airlines won't take the largest suitcase without an $100 fee. I fly Southwest all the time and have never had a problem. It is easy to overload the two large suitcases to over 50 pounds because there is so much room. I pack an extra fold-up small bag in a front pocket to take out 4-5 pounds if the suitcase is over weight.. Great value - has served me well.
customer_reviews.author: tcally

customer_reviews.title: Colors not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two sets of this luggage. One clearly pictured to be a lavender and the other clearly pictured as a light blue. Both arrived MUCH darker than pictured. The purple is a deep plum and the blue is a dark blue. Before buying check American Tourister's web site. The pictures there match exactly what was sent.
customer_reviews.author: John M Venta

customer_reviews.title: Great maneuverability!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these to travel by plane nationally and internationally, they were durable. They didn’t split or tear. And the 4 wheels are a dream!ALL luggage should have 4 wheels!!!great maneuverability in busy airports !
customer_reviews.author: Meyeopinion

customer_reviews.title: Just used for first time, very pleased
customer_reviews.text: We travel often and needed new luggage for a trip to Europe for a family of 4. I got my delivery in 2 days The size of luggage was perfect. We had many layovers and it seemed to take a beating very well. It does seem a bit flimsy on sides,not much support/ structure around sides. I made sure it wasn't expanded, unless it needed to be to give the extra support. It rolled well. I purchased black to avoid the it looking dirty to quickly. They fit within each other for easy storage. Overall for the price we paid I feel it was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Shergalis

customer_reviews.title: Being confident that it won’t break open when the baggage handlers toss them
customer_reviews.text: Are used all three pieces on a flight I was disappointed with the construction seems a little skimpy There are no inside pockets or zipper compartments. I filled them all to capacity and also inserted items in the outside pouches which tended to make the luggage tip over so I had to remove some of it They will OK but I hesitate about how long they will last as the wheels don’t seem very sturdy The appearance is very good however I will be using all three pieces on an international flight soon That will be the test
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: The luggage is great, I just have one concern
customer_reviews.text: The luggage is great, I just have one concern. We have only been on one trip since we received it and when we returned home, I noticed the handle (that you carry) on the largest suitcase felt loose. Now I am concerned about the durability of this suitcase. When we do use it we will have to try to use the handle to wheel it. The reason that we did use the carry handle is getting it from our house to the vehicle and where we stayed was on the 2nd floor and the elevator was being worked on. Both were not great distances so not carried a very long time, that is why the concern.
customer_reviews.author: mimito3

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in American Tourister. I didn't use the item until a few months later and foolishly didn't check everything. I went to use the smallest piece, got it all packed, then found the handle wouldn't retract back into the suitcase. I had to remove everything and actually use duct tape to keep the little peg from popping into the whole so I could slide the handle down. By this point I had already disposed of the box it came in and had to leave for my trip so it's too late to return. I really thought better of the Samsonite Corporation.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I have traveled out of the country to many places with these luggages. I also studied abroad and used the smaller one for when I took weekend trips or traveled to other countries in Europe. The only con is that the smallest bag was a tad too big for European airline, RyanAir and EasyJet's requirements. However, the bag is nice and easy to carry/roll. I also used to the bag traveling throughout Italy on the rail. The bag has been tossed, dragged, dropped (at airport/train station) and I have no holes, rips, damages to the bag on a little dirt. :)
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The reviews and were a little worries one but I'm glad I ordered these. They are beautiful. Took them on their first trip a couple weeks ago and it was great. Having all four wheels rotate was awesome, made it so much easier to move around. The biggest case is pretty big and would be easy to go over the 50lb limit so it might be a good idea to buy a luggage scale. The smallest one was perfect for the carry on. I was worried it would be too tall with the wheels but it wasn't. They all fit nested together for easy storage. The color teal was beautiful and didn't get as dirty as I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: jbeygirls

customer_reviews.title: Great investment, no need for Samsonite, Durable, Rolls Great, Must Have!!!
customer_reviews.text: Color is slightly different than picture, it's more of a dark turquoise. Wheels are good quality, not cheap, it rolls comfortably. Considering how large the biggest one is, it rolls very good and the quality of the material is durable. I've always owned American Tourister luggage but my old one is finally falling apart so I bought this one. I'm sure this set will last me many, many years. Price is great too...If you didn't know, this brand is a sister company for Samsonite...Go this route, save yourself a few hundred dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Islandgirl671

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This luggage set is both attractive and functional. Main compartment can be manually expanded to accommodate additional storage needs. The handle also extends farther if needed. Wheels glide easily sideways as well as forward and backward. The material is durable, neither tearing nor scuffing easily. Lovely lavender color that is easy to recognize at baggage claim. Considering it comes with three pieces, I consider this to be an affordable set that will last a long time. I've always been a fan of American Tourister, but I believe this is even a notch above my prior purchases of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Grey

customer_reviews.title: So easy a 4 year old can use it
customer_reviews.text: We just used this set on a recent trip and we are very happy with it. My favorite luggage before this is a 15 year old samsonite carry on roller (built like a tank and will last for MANY more trips). With kids we need to bring way more stuff and check bags so we got this set. The spinner wheels are very nice and smooth! My 4 year old can "help" with the luggage and easily push the luggage while I hold onto the handle to prevent it from tipping over. The overall construction of the luggage isn't as solid as the samsonite but for the price it is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: C.Fang

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I needed extra luggage for a trip to Florida with the grandkids. I did not want to pay a fortune, and even with 50% off in stores, sets were extremely expensive. I spent a lot a time checking online and reading reviews before purchasing this set. I was unsure, and did not have high expectations. The set is not the highest quality, but you should not expect Tumi for this price. I'm satisfied with the product. The sizes were perfect, and they were not so heavy that it put us over on weight limits. I expect to get plenty of use out of the luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Decent value
customer_reviews.text: While we were excited about getting 3 suitcases for such a great price, we returned them because the red was too loud and we felt the inside did not have as great of quality as others we had seen such as London Fog etc.
customer_reviews.author: Anna W.

customer_reviews.title: Decent luggage for the price
customer_reviews.text: Luggage is decent quality for for the cheap price. Only negatives are that this particular color stains rather easily and the fabric isn't incredbily sturdy. I recently took this luggage on 6 planes and the luggage looked very seasoned at the end of my trip. I suppose that's a chance you take with these ligher colors. I do think the light blue matched the picture pretty closely. The material developed a small rip in one of the larger sized pieces, but the hole didn't make it through the inner layer of the suitcase. The telescopic handles are very handy and the side spinning wheels are a definite bonus.
customer_reviews.author: MoFo

customer_reviews.title: not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Price was decent, bags rolled well, but the middle size was rendered useless by the time we got it at the baggage claim after the flight to our vacation destination. The zipper (pull tabs and slider bodies) for the main compartment were gone and the bag was only partly closed because many of the teeth were still engaged (at least clothing and underwear were not strewn about the airport). Where the unit wasn't serviceable and we would be short 1 bag (likely get over-weight charges if we combined into remaining bags), we needed a replacement. Amazon C/S was helpful to get it done, but it still cost us some additional $ out of pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Gary K

customer_reviews.title: the American Tourister Brand does not disappoint. Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: As always, the American Tourister Brand does not disappoint. Beautiful set. Arrived with no damage, as described and shipping was fast. Happy Customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Zippers are TRASH
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give 0 stars. What good is luggage you can't zip? Some zippers are stuck. Some are completely missing. The large bag zippers has started randomly pulling apart. I used this set no more than 4 times in a year and it's time for the trash can
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Can handle some major weight!
customer_reviews.text: Oh man, maybe it's just because I went from ten year old luggage with a single set of wheels to this, but these are a DREAM. And I gave them a pretty harsh breaking in: I stuffed the biggest and the medium bag FULL of books to take to used bookstores. While getting them in and out of cars was hard, due to the sheer weight, rolling them up and down the San Francisco streets was no problem. I suppose, so long as this review remains at a five star, it means the luggage is holding up!
customer_reviews.author: Dione Basseri

customer_reviews.title: Functional and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Work great. I use these often for travel. The small one is the perfect carry on size, basically the biggest carry on you're allowed. I use the medium one for a check in bag. Haven't used the largest one yet. They seem durable and look cute, and for an excellent price. They did get a little dirty - the blue is turning brownish, but that doesn't really bother me. I would recommend getting a luggage tag because I've seen several others with the exact same bag.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Elgot

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a recent trip to Florida. I wanted luggage with the 360 wheels. Works well overall. Still not sure if I should have bought luggage with inline wheels. The handle wasn't as sturdy as I would have liked when extended.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Finch

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and great rotating wheels on all pieces
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Lightweight and great rotating wheels on all pieces. Cons: Zippers feel a little cheap but they stayed alive for one trip at least. Overall this is a great deal for the quality. I was pleasantly surprised by the rotating wheels. I was expecting some cheap unidirectional wheels for the price. Its very lightweight and seems pretty sturdy. The zipper durability concern me but they didn't show any signs of wear or damage on a 1 stop flight with a plane change.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought the purple which is darker than shown on my monitor (I would call it plum). Bags are roomy and as durable as my more expensive luggage. I would buy these again. I need to check the measurements on the small bag, I am not sure if it is carryon size, as it bigger than my old roller bag I used for that purpose. I packed a lot in the medium suitcase and had room left over for shopping items to bring home. Fabric is thick and protective. After one flight and being lugged around in the car for a week, the suitcase still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Not that sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Seller gets a 5 but the luggage itself is not that sturdy. The first time I took a trip with it overseas, the zipper broke. So I don't know if I would recommend this one to a friend. I have another one also American Tourister Luggage that I purchased at least 5 years ago, but last year I went overseas with it and came back and two zippers of the small pockets were damaged. I tried to call the airport to see if they could replace it but to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Flo D

customer_reviews.title: Good So Far
customer_reviews.text: Received the 3 piece set of luggage and took a 7 day cruise to Alaska. So the luggage made it from MIA to Dallas to Seattle, on the cruise ship, and the same return itinerary. The set was not ripped or torn, however, there were handling marks visible. It is true that a handle on the bottom would make picking up the pieces easier. I really do not have high expectations for the luggage considering the amount paid for the three pieces. So, only time will tell if they can hold up to several more trips planned for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kurtzer

customer_reviews.title: ... our 10-day trip to Ireland and we were very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this set of luggage for our 10-day trip to Ireland and we were very pleased with it. It looked nice, stood out well amongst the other luggage for easy identification on the luggage carousels, had plenty of room inside and pockets to store items, and we especially appreciated the four wheels for easy maneuverability through airports and hotels. We were very pleased with this purchase, and look forward to using this American Tourister luggage for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Zixxer2Go

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: This was a college grad present for our daughter. It was an amazing buy. We looked at new style hard sides, but reviews showed cracking and Zipper problems. We know the limitations of soft side luggage from personal experience. These combine the best of both. They roll easily and smoothly, they are easy to pack, they're different enough to pick out at the airport without being too different. Not a single complaint. She flew with them and they came through beautifully. She is hard to impress and she was genuinely impressed with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Bright Baby

customer_reviews.title: Roomy luggage
customer_reviews.text: The small piece of luggage fits well in the overhead of an airplane, just make sure you put the wheels in first (the suitcase will easily be removed this way and fits better). The only real negative is there is nothing to grab onto at the bottom of the luggage when trying to lift it unless you use the wheels and that is a little awkward. All the luggage holds quite a bit of clothing etc. I really like the luggage and they have been great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to Read

customer_reviews.title: luggage
customer_reviews.text: The luggage itself is perfect. The pieces fit inside one another perfectly for storing. Each piece is expandable. Three adult went to Italy for a 15 day adventure and there was enough room that we did not even need to expand the cases...even with souvenirs packed to return. Picking up the luggage from the airport luggage terminal was great!!!! No ribbons, strings, or bandanas were needed...the bright turquoise color was easily spotted and retrieved Now the down size...in one trip the luggage is filthy. Sure it is the color but bummer it got so dirty so fast.
customer_reviews.author: very satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to travel with so far!!
customer_reviews.text: These bags so far are bright and durable - they've been on a few carribbean and european trips - no problems so far - great varying sizes - I am quite pleased with this purchase - been about 2 years now, still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Ready for Disney now
customer_reviews.text: Searched around for a while looking at luggage and wow is it expensive. Over $400 just for the 29" piece. Found this set I knew it was the one for Christmas for her. Brand is a great brand, it's what I found in almost all the stores Has the 3 sizes, especially the 29" one Each bag is only a few pounds so that isn't really a factor in weight Color is purple, exactly what she wanted 4 wheels that roll very smoothly Time will tell how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: J. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: zippers still work like new and the handles haven't began to show signs ...
customer_reviews.text: Very durable luggage. I have traveled over 30K miles with this luggage. Wheels turn, zippers still work like new and the handles haven't began to show signs of abuse after being thrown around by airline baggage employees. Happy traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Torched metal fab

customer_reviews.title: Purchased in 2012, still going strong. Great quality wheels!
customer_reviews.text: Rolled these suitcases all over the world, on good roads and bad roads and they're holding g up beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Nicol Hemr

customer_reviews.title: AT Pop 3 piece spinner set
customer_reviews.text: Love this luggage! It moves so easily. I'm a bit handicapped and walk with a cane. My old luggage left me bruised from trying to get it through airports. This luggage is a breeze to travel with. My only regret is that the airlines manage to blacken it up by tossing in on the belts. The color makes my bags so easy to spot as it's passing by! Never had anyone confuse my bags with theirs. The comparments are roomy, the handles work great. This was a great bargain buy!
customer_reviews.author: Karin Killenberger

customer_reviews.title: Worked for our Mediterranean Cruise
customer_reviews.text: Took only the large one (because needed 3 large for my family of 3) for our Mediterranean Cruise from Rome to Barcelona. Held up very well and will be using many more times
customer_reviews.author: J18

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great luggage and the color is great, just upset that first trip made them a little dirty but expected I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product with one issue
customer_reviews.text: Overall the luggage is pretty nice. Pros: It's durable, easily adjustable, the color of the photos matches the actual color of the luggage, and a good value. It rolls well when you are pulling it. Cons: The ads claim that the luggage is easy to spin. This does not match our experience. It is no different than other luggage we have used. It is also difficult to push the luggage. Bottom line: If you don't care about pushing your luggage (rather than pulling it), it's a pretty solid value.
customer_reviews.author: CSears

customer_reviews.title: American Tourister Luggage
customer_reviews.text: I took a good look at these three pieces of luggage as they are a wedding gift. I thought they were absolutely beautiful! I couldn't wait for my brother and his wife to open them. They loved them as well! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Monica P. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Nice luggage, nice price
customer_reviews.text: Roomy, durable and priced right. The colors are a little different than the norm which helped in picking it out from the turnstile. Overall, I am pleased. The wheels hold up well and spin great, zipper doesn't stick and opens/shuts easily. We will see how it holds up after several trips but I am happy with the purchase. As always, let me know if my review was helpful or if you have any questions.
customer_reviews.author: Lavenders Cattery

customer_reviews.title: Nice Luggage Set!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking, and it seems plenty sturdy. We don't do a lot of travelling - maybe two trips a year, so it will work just fine for us. We haven't used it yet, but all the zippers, handles, and rollers work just well. Love the spinner wheels! It was a great price and we're really happy with the purchase. We bought the purple so that it would stand out on the airport carousel. I did spray them with Scotchguard, hoping that will help keep them clean longer.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color....
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Luggage!!! Was a little concerned about the blue..It was on sale..I had searched for a week, looking for dependable,affordable bags for my trip to Hawaii..In the picture it looks like that powder blue, men used to wear to prom..ewww! It,s not at all.Matter of fact it is a deep rich blue.When I opened the box, I was so excited..It,s well made, plenty of pockets ..Great Luggage..Thank You Tourister. PS...Look at the nice warranty and fantastic price.. Roberta Bell
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Bell

customer_reviews.title: Nice luggage
customer_reviews.text: First, the color I got was a little darker purple which I love!!! They all fit inside each other for storage. The spinner wheels are awesome. They are medium thickness material, so I suggest a luggage strap for flightsor buy hard shell luggage. The zippers are sturdy and I bought these for a disney trip and the tag says the official luggage of disney world and disney land! LOL ironic. They have an expansion zipper as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonlover28

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color and easy to spot at baggage claim
customer_reviews.text: The largest suitcase is very heavy when full of clothes I couldn’t lift it into the car or carry it up the stairs
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: 4 wheels matters! Those have held up marvelously. ...
customer_reviews.text: 4 wheels matters! Those have held up marvelously. Luggage itself doesn't hold up so well to airline abuse. One of the cases is no longer useable for long international flights as the framing support is kapput.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda K. Longacre

customer_reviews.title: Hardy and good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I used these for 2 long trips - 21 hour each with 2 stops each way. I didn't expect the these light weight bags to last a round trip. Surprise - they did absolutely great and didn't even have a tear or any of the common issues. I would recommend this product over those overpriced super stylish brands seen in malls.
customer_reviews.author: shubhro

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and decent product. Not a great quality. Value for money.
customer_reviews.text: They come stacked within one another. They 3 sizes are appropriate for any kind of travel where in the smallest one can be carried in cabin luggage. The color(purple) looks nice. Its looks better in real than in the picture. The suitcases have not a got a great support around the sides which makes it sag if you put in a lot of weight to it. Rest looks good. I haven't travelled using these luggage so can't comment on that experience yet. Overall I can say that the product is value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish

customer_reviews.title: Inspires confidence
customer_reviews.text: Love them, i traveled recently out of the country, took my old luggage without spinner wheels. BAD MOVE, being a slight woman, it was really hard to move big pieces of luggage alone. My old luggage only went forward and backward, i found out sometimes it is essential to go sideways. I am traveling again next month out of the country and feel much better prepared for a journey alone.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa

customer_reviews.title: Great Luggage
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this set for after going on a cruise and finding our old luggage was difficult to handle. Just came back from another cruise using our new luggage and it was fantastic. All pieces roll smoothly..easy to handle. Packed all cases very full and experienced no problems with the zippers at all. After coming home the luggage still looks fresh and clean even though we know they were treated roughly. We would highly recommend this set to our friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: punkin

customer_reviews.title: They Passed Their First Flight with Flyimg Colors!
customer_reviews.text: Great suitcases. Made it through their first journey with flying colors. The largest suitcase is huge. Be careful on how much you put in the bag because it comes very close to the weight limit. The purple is not as light as it shows.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sells

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and durable
customer_reviews.text: I finally took a vacation and got to use my luggage! As everyone else says, it is a dark color of purple, more of a plum color. It is a beautiful shade of purple, so I am happy with it. The zippers are smooth, and each piece glides well. The only thing I wish the pieces had is a handle on the bottom of the luggage so it's easier to grab and lift when loading. There is a handle on the top and side, but a handle on the bottom (where the wheels are) would be ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice but inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: The suitcases themselves are well made. The color of the cases are actually darker than the image, but that didn't bother me at all. It's a little darker than shown, more like purple than lavender, but I like it because it doesn't show scuff marks as much. The spinner wheels make it a little challenging to stand the luggage upright without extra maneuvering. Also, without a handle on the bottom to assist with laying the suitcase down it makes it awkward to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: KJQ

customer_reviews.title: Okay Budget Level Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a budget level luggage set. The construction is not of particularly high quality. I had a wheel on the largest suitcase break the first time I traveled with it. However, you get what you pay for. If you're on a budget and you need a luggage set these certainly will work. Note that these bags are pretty heavy empty, so with airlines cracking down on checked bag weight, you probably won't be able to pack them to the brim and not go over the weight limits. Luggage is expensive. This is a good intro package, not meant for the frequent traveler.
customer_reviews.author: dabrain13

customer_reviews.title: This luggage is fine for our needs
customer_reviews.text: This luggage is fine for our needs. The nauseating blue makes it super easy to find at the airport. I like to think that anyone digging through luggage skips over ours because they don't agree with our taste. The best thing about this luggage, however, is that it's shipped stored away like the Russian dolls - one inside the other, inside another. American Tourister, you must have been a packaging major at RIT!
customer_reviews.author: dcmets162

customer_reviews.title: These are nice cases. They are not hard cases
customer_reviews.text: These are nice cases. They are not hard cases, but they are fairly sturdy and they are roomy. I've been on several trips and cruises since buying these, and they are holding up well to the luggage apes at the airports and dock sides. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Morris Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Good basic luggage set
customer_reviews.text: I've had this luggage set for over a year now and have used the pieces multiple times and I am still happy with this purchase. Are they the nicest, fanciest bags out there? No. But for this price I wouldn't expect them to be. This is a good luggage set for someone who is wanting to have something nicer than duffle bags to travel with but don't want to spent an arm and a leg on luggage. Besides, airlines beat up luggage as it is, might as well not spend a ridiculous amount on it so when it does get ruined you aren't sad.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jackman

customer_reviews.title: Purple Power!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to spot luggage in a sea of black bags on the carousel. I was a little nervous when the box arrived a bit damaged on the outside, but the luggage was in great condition. So far we have only used for two trips, but they held up well. The value couldn't be beat for a set of 3. I ended up buying two sets.
customer_reviews.author: Jules in Bolton

customer_reviews.title: nice buy
customer_reviews.text: For the price it seems pretty sturdy,specifications were correct and the pieces are all looking good.i like the way all three pieces fit easily into one so a return trip would be easy to carry all instead of trying to pack all three,used it on a short trip already and its still intact looking forward to use on international journey hope it can withstand the rigors of that trip,definitely good value for the price compared to ones in the stores i,ve been to.
customer_reviews.author: candy  rein

customer_reviews.title: Fabric tore on first use - so much for durability.
customer_reviews.text: After first flight and use, saw the large bag had a tear in the fabric where the handle pushes down into the bag but on the outside. What a disappointment after reading good reviews and this being first spinner set. I travel slot and use this set, the handle is sometimes difficult to push back down into bag. Also, it's not all that easy to push along when the bag is full.
customer_reviews.author: k schultz

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I don't think luggage is the type of thing to spend a fortune on, so these were right up my ally. Handles and zippers seem pretty durable and the spinners work fine. Fabric is a bit more flimsy than I anticipated, so I'm anxious to see how it holds up. We have another similar set of American Tourister and they have held up very well over 5+ years but the fabric on those seems a bit stronger. We shall see. My wife digs the purple.
customer_reviews.author: David McLain

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: These suitcases are excellent. They nest inside each other very well, which is helpful in a hotel that doesn't have much storage room--so I just empty them and put them together, and there's only one to store. They seem to be very strong. I have traveled 15 days and been in 11 hotels during that time, and they have survived quite well. My only complaint is that they aren't just a deep enough purple!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Knight

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, Quality fabric
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the blue luggage on a Tuesday, received the luggage on a Friday. This is a gift for an 18 year old, so I am not sure how they hold up travel wise quite yet. The fabric seems like it is decent quality and doesn't appear to seem cheap. The color (blue) was a shade or two darker than I was expecting which I like. The light blue is the picture seemed to be more on the pastel side, but the actual luggage is not as pastel looking. So far, I am happy with the purchase. I hope that the gift holds up for her travels this upcoming year.
customer_reviews.author: deelee

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not a good value. Low price and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Work ok, but should have sprung for a better quality. The large suitcase frame was bent on our first trip. Overall, not terrible but spend a bit more on another American tourister line and get better quality and durability.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: I found these to be a great buy. The structure could be a little better
customer_reviews.text: I found these to be a great buy. The structure could be a little better. I have used the smaller one's and they are great. I like the way they all fit into one suitcase for storage. They move around very well. I would recommend them for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joan1945

customer_reviews.title: Performed Well
customer_reviews.text: The luggage got a workout this month. All pieces worked well and survived the airport gorilla teams of handlers. One of the pieces arrived soaking wet but upon inspection, the contents were nice and dry. What are pleased so far. The only reason I did not give it a 5 star rating is that I have not used it long enough for it to have earned such a rating. Two or three more trips, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen W. Price

customer_reviews.title: great luggage, great price for the set and quality
customer_reviews.text: great luggage, great price for the set and quality. We had another American touristor set for 20 years, had to replace at least the largest suitcase of the set as the airport ripped open the front compartment and we had to duck tape for the remainder of the trip. It was a better buy to purchase the whole set.
customer_reviews.author: A66

customer_reviews.title: Many good features but...........
customer_reviews.text: I found it hard to grab while putting luggage, because there was nothing to hold on to on the wheel end of the suitcase. For the first time, everything was all over inside the case, even after I strapped everything down. I am grateful that nothing was broken. This was sort of a disappointment , because I have used American Tourister in the past. I thought the color was very nice, the front was nicely padded. I really liked the ease the wheels made for which ever direction you were going.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Glover

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the money.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought these. I threw out my last luggage set after a bedbug episode in 2013. These bags have held up being yanked back and forth across the streets of NYC laden with books, as well as many trips on the train for work. The telescoping handles seem a little bit cheap and fragile, so I just make sure I'm extra careful with that part of it. Overall, it's a good set for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the pieces. So far I have only taken this on one trip. I was worried about what would happen when the airport handled it but it was just fine. All the different sizes are perfect and seems to get good quality. Also,I live In a one bedroom so I was concerned about storage but all the pieces easily fit into the largest piece so it doesn't take up too much space in my closet. I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Patrice K

customer_reviews.title: Color is not as it appears on screen
customer_reviews.text: Received this luggage set today and while the luggage is fine, be advised that the color is much darker than it appears on screen ( and I looked at it one 3 different devices). It is a very dark purple...2-3 shades darker than what I was hoping for based on the picture. Also, even the tag that is on the luggage depicts a much lighter purple. I would send it back but it is just too much of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: C. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Looks very good!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my luggage set today, as promised, so delivery was excellent. All the bags look very good and in good condition, no loose strings broken or missing parts. The color is a bit darker than the pic but, in my opinion, looks bette. I'm only giving a 4 star review because I still have to see how good it holds up while traveling. But it does have a 10 year limited warranty so hopefully it lives up to that! 😉
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Lugo

customer_reviews.title: It held up great on four different flights
customer_reviews.text: Used the medium sized suitcase for a month-long trip to South America. It held up great on four different flights, and the 4-wheel design saved me from dragging the bag too much. Would highly recommend to anyone, though I admit I'm regretting not getting the pretty lavender color, as this bag looked exactly like everyone else's bag in baggage claim.
customer_reviews.author: Kramer

customer_reviews.title: great set for the $$$$
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set for my brother to take on a trip to Canada and it was perfect. they roll very easily,are sturdy and feel substantial. He was very happy with the sizes,the fact they nest for storage and the color. Most people have black cases but these are easier to spot on the luggage belts but are still dark enough not to show dirt,wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: browneyedgirl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to carry and stain resistance. My husband spill the coffee on the first time use. After paper tower wipe, it does not look like coffee spilled luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Sun

customer_reviews.title: They are terrific: lots of pockets inside and out
customer_reviews.text: We've used these for several trips now. They are terrific: lots of pockets inside and out, a spacious amount of room in each suitcase, and easy to move on their wheels. This was a very good value for the money. We got all three pieces for less than the cost of one at the retail stores. They seem to be well made. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect suitcase set!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because my current set was wearing out and was outdated. The smallest one is perfect size for a carry-on. It fits a surprising amount of stuff and is easy to handle. It fit into the overhead bin with no difficulty and was easy to remove at the end of the flight. I generally pulled this on two legs, but the ability to turn it sideways and roll it down the plane aisle was super convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, good quality, fair price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. No more staring at black luggage and wondering. Wheels work good as well.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for price, but not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed when this arrived. It was nice that each bag fit inside the one larger size, but it was definitely poor quality (which, of course, you expect from the price) and I'd concerned they wouldn't survive after a few plane trips. But the part that annoyed me was that the description said multiple interior pockets for organization (or something similar) and each bag I opened only had one large interior pocket. I returned these items and got the American Tourister IIite Xtreme Spinner 29 instead and was more pleased with both the quality and interior pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline C.

customer_reviews.title: VERY attractive luggage
customer_reviews.text: I gave this luggage five stars because it is attractive, generous in size, fabric appears to be durable and the zippers are heavy and slide easily. The front side compartments are convenient for storing papers, meds that you need on spur of the moment. The price was also fantastic for three pc. set of AT. I purchased this luggage for a cruise in Nov. so I can't say how it will withstand the airlines, but I believe it will be fine, due to it's quality construction. The generous size and design of this set should allow one to pack a two week supply of clothing, shoes etc. I would recommend this to anyone who needs economical and attractive luggage.
customer_reviews.author: pea cook

customer_reviews.title: Got a deal on these due to color and actually ...
customer_reviews.text: Got a deal on these due to color and actually it worked out really well. Not only did we not pay for a standard color, they were much easier to find on the baggage claim
customer_reviews.author: Maprej

customer_reviews.title: The liners are a good material and the pockets make it easy to store ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set right before my most recent trip. When they arrived, I was pleasantly surprised by how much room there is inside of the suitcases. The liners are a good material and the pockets make it easy to store smaller items. I was very happy with how much I could pack inside them. Walking with them during our trip was easy. The handle extended out to multiple locking positions and the 4 swivel wheels made them very easy to move. All in all, I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I have only used the large size for ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have only used the large size for a cruise I went on last week. The luggage held up great while walking to the cruise ship terminal and while on board. There have been no issues. The spinner wheels work perfectly! I am so happy with this product and the price is very reasonable! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: The cloth looks dirty but th wheels and everything else are still working ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s been years now and I travelled a lot with my family (Asia and Mexico) and still the luggage is doing well. The cloth looks dirty but th wheels and everything else are still working as expected.
customer_reviews.author: switbaby909

customer_reviews.title: c/b good deal
customer_reviews.text: i bought it when there is a good deal. had 3 international flights, and number of flights in the U.S., but still super durable and clean. i hope to use the set at least couple off years more. only thing is; it is kind of soft. if you are looking or something like a stone, this is not the right one. if you are looking for something intermediate, and cheap, this is the best one
customer_reviews.author: Eyup Civelek

product_meta.title: American Tourister Luggage AT Pop 3 Piece Spinner Set (One Size, Orange)
product_meta.description: Size:One Size| Color:OrangeAdd a pop of color to your travels, this is a 3-piece spinner collection that's perfect for the leisure traveler who wants to make a bold statement on the go
feature_bullets: Four multi-directional spinner wheels for easy mobility
Padded top and side carry handles, Front panel pocket for last minute items
Keep your next trip organized with the multiple pockets in American Tourister's AT pop three-piece spinner set.

Set includes: 29" 4 wheeled spinner, 25" 4 wheeled spinner and 21" 4 wheeled carry-on Spinner, 821 Spinner: 21" X 14" X 7.5" 8.6 lbs. 25 Spinner: 25" X 18" X 9.75" 10.2 lbs. 29 Spinner: 29" X 20" X 10" 12.9 lbs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,301 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
